Text: Re Rod Retreat to Maui Apr PST Hi Cooper We have a space in the Mens Dorm if that is okay with you It will be four men in a room with single beds Total cost for the dorm accommodations is I will send you a brochure I think I forgot Let me know if this is okay with you Lisa At AM you wrote Lisa I will send a check today but Im in Canada and it may take a few days to get down there can you reserve a spot for me contigent upon getting a check this week Ive tried unsuccessfully to reserve a spot on this retreat for the last two years thanks Cooper Embedded Enron Capital Trade Resources Corp image moved to file From Piedmont Yoga Studio picpcx PM To cc Subject Re Rod Retreat to Maui Apr Hi Cooper Spaces are going fast but if you get a check in soon you can reserve a spot Send deposit to Piedmont Yoga Studio PO Box Oakland CA Do you have a brochure to fill out a registration form If not just make sure I have your address and phone number I will send you a brochure later Hope you come along Lisa At AM you wrote Hi Im interested in attending Rodneys retreat to Maui from Apr Are there spots open If so can I send a check to reserve a spot Thanks Cooper Attachment Converted cinternetidiomeudorapysattachpicpcx
